effect: The android loses its next slow action.
Both legs are non-functional. The android must stay prone and can only crawl.
One arm is non-functional. The android can only use one-handed gear.
The android's artificial neck is severely fractured and its head placed in an unnatural position. All fast actions become slow actions.
Internal organs spill out and the android is completely immobilized.
The android is torn to shreds or crushed. Core systems are severely damaged and a COMTECH roll is required to communicate with the android.
